help_screen.freq_response_face_auth_failed: According to our rules, every users can only have one successful face authentication account so if you already have one successful authenticated account, you can not pass face authentication again. Please log in your successful authenticated account.
help_screen.freq_response_become_agent: Please kindly pass the face authentication first and then send message to 'Agency Application' in 'Help' then our specialist would help you for the agent application process.
help_screen.freq_response_become_coin_seller: Please add our specialist on WhatsApp {number}
help_screen.freq_question_withdraw_point: Why can't the 'Points to be confirmed' be withdrawn?
help_screen.freq_response_withdraw_point: The system will check the security of the source of 'Points to be confirmed'. It is expected that hosts can withdraw these points after 3 days.
help_screen.freq_question_salary_no_received: I didn't receive salary after making withdrawal. What should I do?
help_screen.freq_response_salary_no_received: 1) If your withdrawal order is under review or paying, please kindly e patient to wait. Your withdrawal request will be handled within 24 - 48 hours. 2) If your withdrawal order showed successful but you did not receive the salary, please send message to 'Help' then our related staff will check your issue further.
help_screen.freq_question_coin_no_received: I didn't receive coins after topping up. What should I do?
help_screen.freq_response_coin_no_received: Please kindly send your payment voucher to us through 'Help', and then our related staff will handle it for you as soon as possible.
help_screen.freq_response_quit_agency: Please kindly send the quiting agency application in 'My agent' then wait your agent's approval. If your agent agree that you leave the agency, you will be removed from the agency automatically
help_screen.freq_question_task_missing: Why is my livestream task missing?
help_screen.freq_response_task_missing: This could have several reasons: 1.Account problems If the new host and multiple female host accounts are logged in on the same mobile phone, the new host will not be able to receive the new host task. 2. Livestream problems 1.The host does not wear makeup, does not show her face for a long time, and wears a mask. 2. The host does not interact with the user and closes the microphone for a long time. 3. The live broadcast environment of the host is poor or the live broadcast is outdoors, the camera shakes seriously, and minors appear on the scene (poor network, no mic, poor live broadcast background, poor lighting, and loud live broadcast noise).
help_screen.liv_question_male_conditions: The live conditions of male users
help_screen.liv_response_male_conditions: Please kindly note that male users need to reach wealth level 10 and pass the face authentication process then they con start livestream.
help_screen.liv_question_higher_reward: How can I get a higher hourly reward for live streaming?
help_screen.liv_response_higher_reward: You could fo click on 'Reward' -> 'Live' -> <Level up rules> and check details fo it.
help_screen.recharge_question_coin_no_received: I didn't receive coins after topping up. What should I do?
help_screen.recharge_response_coin_no_received: Please kindly send your payment voucher to us through 'Help', and then our related staff will handle it for you as soon as possible.
help_screen.game_question_exchange_diamonds: How to exchange Coins to Diamonds?
help_screen.game_response_exchange_diamonds: Click arrow on the right of diamond then stroke the button to put how many coins you want to exchange then click 'Exchange'
help_screen.game_question_no_winning_coins_received: I won the game but I didn't receive winning coins. What should I do?
help_screen.game_response_no_winning_coins_received: Please kindly provide the exact time when game issue happened or the screenshots and video records about your issue then we can check your issue further.
help_screen.report_question_user_violation: The user has violated the rules, why is my report not processed?
help_screen.report_response_user_violation: Thank you for your report. We need to ID of the reported user and evidence (such as screenshots) that can prove the truth of your report before we can follow up the investigation and deal with it
help_screen.account_question_forget_login_method: How to log in in my account if i forget my log in method?
help_screen.account_response_forget_login_method: If you lost the login method and password for your account, please submit your request to 'Account and Security' in 'Help' then our related staff will help further.
help_screen.account_response_change_gender: After you pass face authentication, submit the request to modify your gender to the customer service through 'Feedback and Help', and it will be processed for you immediately after receiving it.

cancel_account_screen.account_cancellation_explain: 1. Account cancellation means the account is deleted! The account cancellation is different from logout;
cancel_account_screen.after_canceling_advice: 2. After canceling your account, you will lose all the information of itt such as chat history, matching, personal data, and your moments, and they con not be recovered;
cancel_account_screen.vip_advice: 3. Your VIP privileges, guardian privileges and service validity period will get invalid; the remaining amount in your wallet will get invalid (including points, pp coins, gold coins, etc.); purchased value-added services will get invalid.
cancel_account_screen.attention_advice: 4. Attention: Once you confirm the cancellation of your account, your account can not be restored.
cancel_account_screen.you_will_lose_all_data: You will lose all data and contents under your account. Please handle it carefully!

store_screen.confirm_purchase: Congratulations on receiving a new {item_name}! Whether to user it immediately.

my_obtained_items_screen.renewed_succeed: Congratulations, you renewed your {item_name} from {category} adding {days} days.

invitation_gift_screen.the_more_you_invite: The more you invite, the more you will get
invitation_gift_screen.how_to_invite_explain: Invite friends to register, friends can download for the first time through the link you shared; when the invitee completes the registration, the invitation can be successful
invitation_gift_screen.how_to_earn_reward_explain: If the invitee completes face authentication and the following tasks, you will receive corresponding rewards. Note: The new host only count 3 hours of live broadcast everyday
invitation_gift_screen.reward_invited_broadcast: Invited host to broadcast for {hours} hours within {days} days
invitation_gift_screen.reward_invited_income: Invited host income reached {money} within {days} days
invitation_gift_screen.only_display_top: Only display the top {number} data from last {days} days.

rank_screen.daily_host_ranking: The ranking fromm Monday to Thursday is Daily Host Ranking, and only the points income of the current day is counted
rank_screen.daily_host_ranking_rule_1: 1. The ranking is based on the total points of gifts received by the host from live.
rank_screen.daily_host_ranking_rule_2: 2. The platform points reward will not be counted in the ranking.
rank_screen.daily_host_ranking_rule_4: 4. Rewards need to be claimed manually by hosts on the next day, and the rewards will be waived if the hosts fail to claim them on time.
rank_screen.ranking_from_fri_sun: The ranking from Friday to Sunday is a 3-day Ranking, the total points income for the 3 days form Friday to Sunday is counted
rank_screen.ranking_from_fri_sun_rule_1: 1. The ranking is based on the total points received by the host from live from Friday to Sunday
rank_screen.ranking_from_fri_sun_rule_3: 3. The rewards need to be claimed manually by hosts on Monday between 00:00:00 to 23:59:59 (UTC+8), the rewards will be waived if the hosts fail to claim them on time.
rank_screen.total_live_from_fri_sun: Total live streaming from Friday to Sunday >= 3 hour
rank_screen.ranked_in_last_month: 1. Ranked by the number of gold coins consumed by the user in the last natural month.
rank_screen.ranked_in_last_days: 1. Ranked by the number of gold coins spent by the user in the last 7 days.

live_application_screen.upload_live_cover: Please upload the live cover again
live_application_screen.wealth_level_explain: To start the live broadcast, the wealth level needs to reach level {level_number}
live_application_screen.at_less_live_photo: At least upload the live photo

host_rules_screen.account_rules_1: 1. No ID registration for a person underage
host_rules_screen.account_rules_2: 2. One user can only have one authenticated ID,
host_rules_screen.account_rules_2_continue: open live and money withdraw only for authenticated ID
host_rules_screen.account_rules_3: 3. Impersonation of face authentication for the purpose of opening live and money withdraw will be banned permanently
host_rules_screen.account_rules_4: 4. Offer ID to someone else for the purpose of opening live
host_rules_screen.account_rules_4_continue: will be banned permanently by the system.
host_rules_screen.account_rules_5: 5. Female ID registered by male users maliciously will be banned permanently by the system
host_rules_screen.cover_photo_explain: The cover photo will e displayed for Live/Party cover
host_rules_screen.cover_photo_rules_2: 2. The Live-stream will be cut off if the host does not upload a compliant cover photo.
host_rules_screen.cover_photo_rules_3: 3. The more gorgeous cover photo and the better Live performance host practice, the more exposure they will get.
host_rules_screen.cover_photo_rules_4: 4. The non-compliant cover photos are shown below:
host_rules_screen.cover_no_pass_audit: The cover cannot pass the audit
host_rules_screen.live_advice: Any breaks of Live rules might cause the cancellation of live task rewards on the day, please follow the platform rules accordingly
host_rules_screen.live_rules_3: 3. Keep your face inside the camera during the entire Livestream
host_rules_screen.live_rules_4: 4. Sit comfortably and focus on Livestream, do not lie on the bed
host_rules_screen.live_rules_7: 7. Proper dresses and makeups, makes good use of beauty effects during Livestream
host_rules_screen.live_rules_8: 8. Take initial to greet and interact with users
host_rules_screen.change_agency_1: 1. If the quitting agency application has not been processed by the agent in 7 days, the host will leave agency automatically.
host_rules_screen.change_agency_2: 2. The host who has not passed the face authentication can directly quit the agency after the first application without agent approval.
host_rules_screen.change_agency_3: 3. The host who joined the agency for less than 1 day can directly quit the agency after submitting the first leaving agency application.
host_rules_screen.change_agency_4: 4. After submitting the leaving agency application, the host will not be able to submit another one within 30 days whether it has been approved or declined.
host_rules_screen.change_agency_5: 5. Agents can still approve the application of the host to leave the agency within 14 days after the first rejection.

new_task_system_screen.dear_host: Dear hosts, in order for {app_name} to have a healthier development, {app_name} will adjust the host task system
new_task_system_screen.host_daily_task: Host daily task depends on the 7 days total livestream income(Income of Join Party and Watch Live will be included too, not including platform reward)
new_task_system_screen.daily_income: The daily income increases, and the task reward can be upgraded immediately, but the task of the same period can only be claimed once. It is recommended to receive the task rewards after leveling up
new_task_system_screen.registration_policy: of registration can enjoy protection policy
new_task_system_screen.not_new_host: Not new host and the recent 7 days income
new_task_system_screen.notice_2: 2. Income includes live income and party income(Income of Join Party and Watch Live will be included too, not including platform reward).
new_task_system_screen.notice_3: 3. On the second day after the income reaches the target, the new live task will be automatically displayed.
new_task_system_screen.notice_4: 4. Hosts who have registered multiple accounts, and those who log in with multiple IPs and multiple devices will be closed all tasks.

contact_us_screen.for_more_details: For more details, please visit our website

reward_coins.credit_explain: Credits are the means by which you can make calls in the app, offer Gifts to your favorite actors in your lives or to your friends in chat conversations.
reward_coins.buy_explain: Buy an amount of credits according to our table of precarious that we have available.
reward_coins.earn_credits_explain:
Earn credits as a reward for watching videos.
The more you watch the more credits you will accumulate until you make a fortune.
reward_coins.congratulations_msg: Congratulations, you just earned {credit} credits for watching the video.

my_level_screen.level_privilege_1: 1. High level users will have a logo to distinguish their status
my_level_screen.level_privilege_2: 2. The higher your level. the more customized privileges you'll enjoy.
my_level_screen.complete_following_actions: Complete the following actions to gain EXP
my_level_screen.users_are_rewarded: Users are rewarded with a most EXP x10 of the gift's uDiamonds price per grand animated gift, still gifts, facial recognition gifts and lucky gifts;
my_level_screen.after_becoming_guardian: After becoming a guardian, a user can obtain max EXP, equal to x10 the uDiamonds spent.
my_level_screen.user_gain_highest: Users gain the highest amount of EXP = uDiamonds used x20 when purchasing profile picture frame, bullet card, public broadcast and vehicles.
my_level_screen.newly_registered: Newly registered user of the day: Watch stream (+5 EXP, 1 EXP/ minutes): The daily limit of EXP from watching stream each day is 200;
my_level_screen.newly_recharge: Newly registered user recharges for the 1 st time in the same day; 200 Exp
my_level_screen.first_recharge: First recharge: (Mutually exclusive with condition 3, not accumulative) Get 100 EXP.
my_level_screen.join_fan_club: Join a Fan club for the first time: Get 100 EXP;
my_level_screen.edit_fan_club: Edit Fans Group info for the first time: 50 EXP;
my_level_screen.join_a_fan_club: Join a Fan Club: Get 50 EXP, except the first time, you will get 50 EXP every time you join a new club (included renewals). You can join multiple Fan Clubs at the same time.
my_level_screen.activate_monthly: Activate monthly subscription tier: Adds 5000 EXP per first time purchases $ each successful renewal;
my_level_screen.activate_3_months: Activate the 3 months tier: increase by 16,000 EXP;
my_level_screen.activate_6_months: Activate the 6 months tier: increase by 28,000 EXP;
my_level_screen.activate_13_months: Activate the 12 months tier: increase by 57,000 EXP;
my_level_screen.premium_member_gain: Premium members will gain 3% more EXP via other actions than non-premium members
my_level_screen.first_stream_day: First stream of the day: 10 EXP;
my_level_screen.stream_duration: Stream duration EXP: 3 EXP/min, doesn't count if stream is less than 1 min; Max 200 EXP a day.
my_level_screen.watch_stream_gain: Watch stream gain 1 EXP/1 minute; Daily limit of 120 EXP (less than 1 min doesn't count)
my_level_screen.link_on_min: Link 1 min = EXP; the daily limit is 120 EXP at max
my_level_screen.share_your_stream: Share your stream every day: 10 EXP/time; Max 30 EXP
my_level_screen.record_and_share: Record and share your stream every day: 10 EXP/time; Max 30 EXP;

post_comment_screen.reported_succeed_explain: Comment reported, you won't see it again.
post_comment_screen.reported_failed_explain: Verify your internet connection and try again later.
